effect_entries.effect:
This Pokémon cannot have its stats lowered by other Pokémon.

This ability does not prevent any stat losses other than stat modifiers, such as the Speed cut from paralysis; nor self-inflicted stat drops, such as the Special Attack drop from overheat; nor opponent-triggered stat boosts, such as the Attack boost from swagger.  This Pokémon can still be passed negative stat modifiers through guard swap, heart swap, or power swap.

This ability functions identically to clear body in battle.

Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is halved.
effect_entries.short_effect: Prevents stats from being lowered by other Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
被白色烟雾保护着，
不会被对手降低能力。

白い煙に　守られて
相手に　能力を　下げられない。

The Pokémon is protected by its white smoke, which
prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.

Il Pokémon è protetto da un fumo chiaro che
impedisce ai nemici di diminuire le sue statistiche.

El humo blanco que lo protege evita que otro
Pokémon le baje las características.

Indem es sich mit pulvrigem Rauch umhüllt, hindert
es Angreifer daran, seine Statuswerte zu senken.

Un écran de fumée empêche l’ennemi de baisser
les stats du Pokémon.

被白色煙霧保護著，
不會被對手降低能力。

하얀 연기의 보호를 받아
상대가 능력을 떨어뜨릴 수 없다.

しろいけむりに　まもられて
あいてに　のうりょくを　さげられない。

相手に　能力を
さげられない。
